name: Aberrate
description:
Lost in the wind and sands of this desert you slowly push your way forward seeking the Obelisk. With each step you begin to fade away. With each fight a part of you disappears. You are Abberate to this land and it will try to swallow you whole.

Abberate was an art project. All character, object and environment art were created and designed by me. I also did full development for the animations included within the game.
